name: Rebirth (itch) (SoulBounded, Kaynn Cahya)
description:
Oh no! You angered the viking gods in your previous life and now you have been sent to the pillar of fate, where you must fend off countless undead vikings.

If you perish after killing a bunch of them, the gods may reward your display of strength with a second chance...back on the pillar of fate of course, death is only the beginning after all. Have fun!

Controls:

  • Move: "WASD" Keys
  • Throw Axe: "Left click"
  • Menu Navigation: "W & S" Keys
  • Menu Selection: "Left click"

Made by:

  • https://soulbounded.itch.io/
  • https://kaynn-cahya.itch.io/

Free Asset Credits:

  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
